item.description: Wrap-up at the Derby! Largest Coho today. 15.45lbs! With. Chris, jarrett, and Taylor! Gr8 team!! http://t.co/BAasfBGld6

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Honoured to receive the salute as #RCMPMusicalRide packs out Arbutus Meadows Arena #NanooseBay. Kudos to #Parksville Rotary Am. Well Done!

item.title: Mentioned by Nanaimo News Bulletin
item.description:
Money earmarked for Nanaimo's assembly wharf
Peter Van Loan, leader of the government in House of Commons, left, and James Lunney, Nanaimo MP, announce $4.65 million in federal funding to help upgrade the Nanaimo Assembly Wharf into a short-sea container shipping facility during a ceremony at ...
